website_summaries.verdict: This attractive queen comforter set has pleasing aesthetics, a plush feel, and easy-to-care-for materials. Excellent quality for the price.
pros: Microsuede exterior is luxuriously soft and comfortable
Warm and cozy enough for cooler weather
Pieced design adds texture without being overly busy
Also comes with 3 bonus decorative pillows
cons: Some users complained that the actual colors weren't exactly as pictured
Might be too warm for hot sleepers

customer_reviews.title: Ripped apart first wash. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping took a long time, but it looked nice once it arrived. However, I followed the washing instructions for the comforter and it ripped at the seams. Very disappointed as it even says you can wash the comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Sari

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Super soft. The three decorative pillows were perfect, very cute and not smashed in the package. Very well made product, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: KyrieAnn

customer_reviews.title: A Big Yowza!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Madison Park Palmer 7 Piece Comforter Set I bought. It's that fabulous! I don't know what the magic is, but this comforter manages to keep you cool when it's warm and warm when it's cold. Everything in the set is really well-made and really good-looking. And what you get for the price is unbeatable. Currently looking for a third bed just to give me an excuse to buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: HeckYeah22

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected so far
customer_reviews.text: Oddly better than expected. Light and warm. I had a million to pick from my a Christmas gift and this was a hit. Normally when guys pick this sort of thing out it had better be Prime and you had better keep the box. In this case not only did it go on the bed it has stayed there and it looks great. Not sure if it will last, but not much does under the dog but for the price who cares? We have noticed that it is light but quite warm and it breathes. I cleverly bought a king for a queen bed...
customer_reviews.author: David Bailey

customer_reviews.title: I wasted my hard earned money!
customer_reviews.text: In order to post this i had to give it a rating, it should be ZERO! This is by far the worst craftsmanship I have come across! I’m so disappointed, words cannot describe... Crooked seams throughout the entire comforter and all the pillows, therefore the wrinkles are permanent. This is an eyesore to me. I very much regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: KFK

customer_reviews.title: Don’t listen to the negative comments.  Mine is perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was back and fourth on this comforter set. I will tell you. I bought the same set from Jc penny a few years back for my mom in a different color. It is a lot heavier this this set I just got for myself. However, living in Texas. This is not a problem! I saw negative reviews that held me back. And maybe I was lucky. But. It is perfect. No rips. No odors. Not even that wrinkled from the package. I have a king size bed and I ordered the California king. I have approximately 12 inches on each side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little too small...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given another star if I would have ordered the California King instead of King. With a deep mattress you need the extra width or length to make it work. For the money it's lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn in Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of the comforter. There was a smudge on it I noticed when I put it on my bed, so I decided to wash it on delicate, followed all instructions. I still have the smudge and the red from the comforter bled into the tan and is coming apart at the seam. I lm bummed, I don’t have the money to get another one 😞
customer_reviews.author: kjellesed

customer_reviews.title: It came in plum and grey, not plum and a cream color. Still very beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. The comforter is nice and thick, the pillows match... it's beautiful. The only issue I have is I thought the colors were plum and an off-white/cream - because that's what I saw in the picture. When I got it, it was plum and grey. Now it turns out my black lab and grey are a MUCH better match than my black lab and cream would have been! I absolutely love the grey - and probably would have ordered it if I had thought it was an option, so it ended up being a win win for me... just beware it may come in plum and grey....
customer_reviews.author: c4mp1ng

customer_reviews.title: Soft, warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this bedding set. I’ve had a king size spread on a California king size bed for a while low because I couldn’t find anything I really liked. I hated always feeling short sheeted by our comforter before I finally pulled the plug on this one. It’s a little pricier than I would normally spend. Bedding is way over priced to me. Hopefully this will last long enough to justify what I paid for it’s warm, comfortable, cuddliness.
customer_reviews.author: April DL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Is very warm as other reviews indicated
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Is very warm as other reviews indicated. Fits my kingsize bed fine. Note that it does stain easily. Stains are super hard to remove (I am talking about a small drop of body lotion ) Colors are beautiful. Material feels like moleskin. All in all, the entire package is a great deal and looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color and SO Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter. It matches our room perfectly. We have a very tall King, we went for the Cali King size and its perfect. We had to do a quick exchange and it was So easy and fast. As soon as it was scanned we got the refund and the new box was here in two days, I love that! We have dogs so I am hoping it will clean well. So far so good. The material is great quality and soft. The pillows are a great touch! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: tawnie

customer_reviews.title: from the other side of the room the beige fabric looks like a sheet
customer_reviews.text: Returned this the day I opened the package and put it on the bed. While the quality is okay, from the other side of the room the beige fabric looks like a sheet, and the wide brown stripe looks like a brown bed runner. It just didn't look as classy as it looks in this photo. Wasn't happy about having to spend $37 to return it, but I really didn't like the way it looked and certainly didn't want to look at it for years to come. BTW the weight of the bedspread seemed about medium. Maybe in a smaller bedroom it would work better.
customer_reviews.author: Lindalu

customer_reviews.title: bed skirt is NOT ironable.
customer_reviews.text: The bed skirt is not ironable. Who makes a bed skirt that is not ironable? It's pretty, it's nice - it's wrinkled and the tag states - do NOT iron. The colors are as shown, the pillows are nice. The who assemble is nice -with a wrinkled bed skirt. I am not sending it back, just not using the bed skirt.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Comfy comforter with nice colors
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this on my bed for about 5 months and it has held up well. I use this as my summer set, and it is light and soft. The king size was necessary for my queen pillow top bed. It easily covers the sides. The colors are nice. Someone noted the light colored stitching on the colored panels. It is very few, 2 or 3 places and hardly noticeable. Pillows are also nice. Nice set for the price. Plus machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: L. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Is Not a True Navy Blue
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift. When it arrived I saw that it was not navy blue. It is more of a dark skate blue. The couple I had ordered it for was doung their master bedroom in navy blue. We held the comforter set against all of the other navy blue items they had received as gifts and it was way to light colored. The color is pretty but don't purchase if you need a true dark navy blue. Sadly, we had to return this set and I ask the couple to please look through the other sets for a true navy blue one.
customer_reviews.author: Suthrn Angel

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: When the evenings in Michigan are 70 and your comforter leaves you waking up chilled, I'd have to say this is definitely not one you want to keep warm. It looks nice, but the first time I layed back on the throw pillow (on accident), the seam busted. I will sew the pillow up because I like the design, but the comforter is back in the bag. I will put it in the guest room with an under blanket. I spent the money and purchased a down duvet instead (which I LOVE). You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and looks good!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter set in much lighter in color than it is advertised. The top material is a saude/micro fiber with the bottom sporting a thin silk like material. The quality is medium to poor. It would be an excellent comforter set in a guests bedroom where is is not used a lot and its main purpose is to look good. The throw pillows however are wonderful and well made. Overall not a bad purchase but a bit pricey for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Comforter
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a comforter set for quite a while. Most were gaudy and most were purple, or white, or had pictures that looked like velvet paintings. This beautiful beige and brown is the perfect blend of class and unique style. The brown adds a very nice touch. Understated elegance. It is quite comfortable to sleep under, which was a nice surprise, since it is very puffy. The fabric just feels good. Measure your bed! This is perfect for a twinXL with a nice drop all around. It might be a smidge short for a full..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for New California King mattress set. The quality overall appears to be very nice but the comforter is lighter weight than expected. The comforter is also smaller on a California king than expected and only hangs just to the side midline of our 12-inch mattress spread
customer_reviews.author: Morkgto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We love this comforter! It's more than generous size-wise, fitting nicely on our king size bed. It's super soft and not too happy. It's also easy to keep clean as we've run it through the washer and dryer without any issues. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Reads & Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Makes our master bedroom look like a fancy hotel.
customer_reviews.text: Our comforter of 15 years had a tear in it so I found the Madison Park King Comforter on Amazon. to take it's place. They had a nice selection but the tan and beige combination was most to out liking and decor. The comforter arrived on time and in great shape with all 3 decorative pillows. Our son is a little jealous of how good our comforter looks and we are considering getting him the same comforter in a different size and color scheme. We have always joked that our King size bed is like sleeping in a fancy hotel and now our master bedroom looks like we are in one too.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Frost

customer_reviews.title: RIPS EASILY
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the look and feel of this comforter, unfortunately it ripped on the first day on the very first wash. I’ve had it now for about a month and it has ripped again on another seam. I would love to give it 5 stars because it’s is so soft and comfortable, but for the price I paid I was expecting a longer lasting comforter. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: I really like this comforter set
customer_reviews.text: I really like this comforter set. I got the red one and I love the new look of my bedroom! The colors are true to the picture, and it is very fluffy. It is so soft. I washed it upon receiving it. I let it dry for one cycle in the dryer and then hung to dry. It is very comfortable, but does get a little hot! So far I love it, but I have only had it for a week now. I'll update about durability when I have it longer.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the color and look of this comforter set. My only complaint is there were a lot of loose strings that needed to be cut, so I do wonder how it will wear over time, but it looks wonderful! I went with the purple set, included some pictures with different lighting so you can get an idea of how the color looks.
customer_reviews.author: Kari E. Fanning

customer_reviews.title: Really nice but...
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter set. There were 2 problems though....the mattress slides around because of the slippery material on the dust ruffle. The comforter needs to be wider due to the thickness of my top 12 inch mattress( which is not a thick pillow top). The price was right so I will be happy! UPDATE: The dust ruffle is coming about at the seams. I never could get the wrinkles out of it either. Ironing did not do it. Surprised to see the price has increased since I bought it AS OF 10-25-2020
customer_reviews.author: JBM

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. It looks as shown in the ad. Very comfortable and does look like you paid more. I wouldn't use this on a bed where you need to wash the comforter often. The stitching isn't excellent. One stitch already came out. I have it on our guest bedroom bed and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Marilee

customer_reviews.title: Shipped with NO loose threads, perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just need to say, I'm very girly and my husband is not, even he thought it looked amazing! Secondly, our new puppy immediately peed on it day 1 and the stain came right out. All in all I love this bed set! Definitely would recommend and/or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This comforter was very heavy and cumbersome definitely not for the summer months. I also had to wash it and it ripped, plus the colors faded on each other in the dryer.. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: monienonie

customer_reviews.title: The best comforter set ever
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I put this on my bed. It’s the perfect color arrangement to match my room. My kids love how soft it is and I love how elegant it makes me feel. I got lucky and got it for cheaper, it’s worth every penny. Pick this one!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Comilla

customer_reviews.title: Soft suede fabric, beautiful colors!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my new comforter set! I had been looking for something to go along with my new grey curtains (including a bathroom set) and found this 7pc to be a nice match! Separately I ordered the two charcoal grey 24” pillows and they look amazing together! Happy with the purchase overall, highly recommended for the price. Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer!

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I think that for the price, it's an excellent buy. However, I think the picture must be of the world's shortest bed as the top cover on my queen bed when folded like the picture is about 2' shy of the top of the bed--that's why I took off a star. The comforter is extremely warm and quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: emily m. holton

customer_reviews.title: guest room remake
customer_reviews.text: What a great set for the money and completely change your spare bedroom. Just amazing and such a good deal that has everything you may need. It is simply beautifully soft and fits perfectly. It comes in great colors but we loved this navy/grey for sure. go get one.
customer_reviews.author: MikeSmith

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color. Gray not ivory...
customer_reviews.text: Not as described. Description states it’s ivory and plus. But it is in-fact GRAY. Which does not match the room as anticipated. Don’t know if this is the color it is suppose to be or if it was an error. Would like to reorder if it does come in ivory/beige like and dark plum. Has anyone received a different color? Can’t rate the other categories as I’m returning it tomorrow
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Slightly short
customer_reviews.text: This bedding was exactly as show in photo, Color is perfect, but I only sish it was about 6 to 12" larger, I have had many king comforters and this on is just a good fit, but when I put it on the bed, it only covers half of pillows in order to keep the gray detail on the bottom on the top of bed surface. Good value, good buy, minor complaint. I will use this, because it is the perfect color and design for my room
customer_reviews.author: Tammy LaMay

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase this item
customer_reviews.text: The red part of this comforter had been stitched in places with the beige thread, it was very unsightly. The thin brown strip was completely sewn incorrectly which made it crooked, very obviously crooked. The detail stitching on the shams were also sewn incorrectly which didn't allow it to lay properly. Very disappointing. Also, I purchased the California king and it was no bigger than my old king I had on my bed. Take my advice, save your money and time and keep looking elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Drew Martin

customer_reviews.title: Weird fabric
customer_reviews.text: This set looks great and the many pillows are a plus, BUT as others have commented, the underside of the comforter is made from a weird fabric. I don’t know how to describe it other than to say it feels odd and seems cheap. This could have been a fabulous set, even five star worthy, if not for the freakish fabric on the of the comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Angie R

customer_reviews.title: Unable to wash in washing machine
customer_reviews.text: This comforter set is not machine washable. When I washed it the first time on gentle cycle, the heat from the water caused the fabric to melt like plastic, causing holes in the comforter. When trying to wash the throw pillows, the same issue occured with the cotton inside the pillow coming out. I was afraid to even attempt to place in dryer on no heat- tumble for fear it would cause even more damage. If you are unable to take the set to the Cleaners and your only option is a washing machine, this set may not be the best option
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Loved the product....!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I was looking for... a more masculine looking comforter, sham, and pillow set... perfect fit, extremely easy to make the bed in the morning, and the material is nice and soft to the touch, plus not TOO HOT.... you don't have to kick off the covers in the middle of the night. perfect for warmer climates...... thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Malouin

customer_reviews.title: didn't care for it
customer_reviews.text: The quality seemed fine on this set, I just didn't care for it when I saw it in person. The comforter is like a soft chambray type material, which I didn't really care for. Also, it looked a bit too masculine for my taste. The colors were fairy close to what they appeared on my computer monitor, but that doesn't necessarily mean they will be for you if your settings are different than mine.
customer_reviews.author: marykat34

customer_reviews.title: Very great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the material of this comforter and it keeps you warm on the cold winter nights. I had to return the first one since I bought a queen and needed a full size one, but amazon made it really easy for me to return.
customer_reviews.author: Sam H

customer_reviews.title: Gross.
customer_reviews.text: This is the UGLIEST blanket I have ever owned. Does not look like advertised. The lines down the middle look grimy and dirty. Maybe it's comfortable? I haven't slept in it yet, but I probably won't even try. Pillows are tough and cheap feeling. Will probably return this .
customer_reviews.author: Td

customer_reviews.title: The spread is big enough
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews that said the cover was not big enough. I have a tempurpedic mattress that is at least 12 inches thick, and the cover is absolutely adequate on a queen size mattress. Falls well below the bottom of the mattress by a couple inches on both sides and the foot of the bed. It is very soft, extremely lightweight and yet is nice and warm. I really love this set.
customer_reviews.author: Terie Dotson

customer_reviews.title: Comfort review
customer_reviews.text: I mixed a little blue in, its okay thought it would be thicker
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bottley

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This set is beautiful! It's soft, warm and looks quite elegant. I'm a very happy consumer given this set. I'd definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Flowers

customer_reviews.title: A little small for king bed.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice comforter set but the bed skirt and the comforter were a bit short for the bed. Great value!! Wish it had worked!! I returned this quilt set. Confirmed with UPS that it was received back by the company on 9-11-20. The info on the return tracking still indicating return is “on its way”. Ridiculous that the refund hasn’t been given to my account considering it was received by them 6 days ago. Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnda

customer_reviews.title: Poor Workmanship
customer_reviews.text: My recommendation is to not purchase this item. Reason is, poor workmanship. The stitching is very poor. The seams are not aligned. Loose threads are coming out of the seams everywhere. The seams are not correctly gathered together, but instead are randomly stitched together. The product was made in China, and it appears whoever sewed the material together had no training or experience, or maybe didn't care. Your money would be better spent elsewhere. Unfortunately, this was a gift, and by the time the receiver opened the package, it was beyond the Amazon "return window."
customer_reviews.author: B Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but seems rushed in the making.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be made with good materials, though evacuation was a little off. There are stray threads all over from where stitching starts and ends, which is far too enticing for the pets. If you have pets I suggest looking it over and snipping those threads before putting it on your bed. The blanket is very warm without being too heavy or bulky. I saw some reviews stating it ran a little small for the king so I bought a California king size and it covers most of my 15” king mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Has been on the bed only a couple of weeks and is completely stretched out. Both the comforter and the shams. We don't sleep with comforter on the bed and we don't sit on it. I have had other Madison Park bed sets that have lasted for years. This one will have to be replaced before very long.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I ordered a king size for my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Burns

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and not too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Although this is stated as microsuede, I would call it micro microsuede. It’s as if the microsuede is thinned out. It is not the quality I was expecting. The pillows are too firm. The corners lay down well and the bed skirt makes it look pricier.The comforter is soft and cozy, not too heavy, good for all seasons. It is not worth the hefty price though.
customer_reviews.author: loree

customer_reviews.title: Love it - but one fatal flaw...
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter. So soft and cozy. But it does not handle laundering well. It washes fine but it does not like going in the dryer. Even low heat melts/warps it. We have 3 dogs so it needs to be laundered fairly often. If this handled laundering better, it would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful comforter, lousy stitching.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed set, however, highly disappointed on to craftsmanship. I've had it for less than a week, and the stuffing is coming out of one of the decorative pillows, inside seam of comforter appears unstitched and stuffing is moving around.
customer_reviews.author: Lexx28

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I think the price was great and so is the quality. I have not been able to use the pillow cases yet as they are made for longer than average pillows so I need to buy some that fit. Other then that the comforter is great. I really like this set.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Marie

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: This set looks much nicer online than in person. It looks plush and comfortable online, but it's rather flat and looks cheaply made. I could have gotten a more attractive set at Walmart at least 25-30% cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking comforter set however, the microsuede feels cheap and the static is unbelievable. I tried drying on low heat with several bounce sheets and sprayed with anti-static spray but nothing helped. I could not use this on my guest bed because of the static. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: E. Fosina

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Design
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a like new one that unfortunately had some "lumps" possibly from previous wash? Other than that it's a nice set. Had it in the purple color for years, went with this color when I upgraded to a king size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi K

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but it’s beautiful 😇
customer_reviews.text: Loved it have it on my bed in my RV MOTORHOME .... pic to follow
customer_reviews.author: angel perry

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: This is just like the description... Colors were right on... Well made.. The sheets soften up nicely after a wash or 2... The comforter has been through the wash 3x now... Not a problem at all... Well made, no loose stitching. Very happy with this purchase... Highly recommend. Not a particularly warm comforter... Pretty light weight, but it isn't at all flat.... Well stuffed... Really happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Rob H

customer_reviews.title: Advertised wrong. Still happy.
customer_reviews.text: Comforter looks very nice. But disappointed that this was advertised wrong. It says is comes with a flat sheet and fitted sheet and it did not. Still satisfied with the beautiful comforter. But upset with the wrong advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Squares don’t work
customer_reviews.text: Kthe only thing I don’t care for is the little square stitching every 6 inches or so to keep it from moving inside the comforter. I think it should have regular quilting. It would be much prettier.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Orris

customer_reviews.title: Lovely & plush!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this comforter set! Ultra soft, yet beautiful! **I should mention that I took the advice from other reviews to go up a size. I have a Queen, but ordered King—worked perfectly**
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I will never not love this bedding set. The comforter alone is absolutely amazing! I LOOOOOVVVVVVEEEE this set and have no regrets about purchasing it. It came early too, bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this bed set! So soft and comfortable. It’s light for warm weather but definitely keeps me warm on cooler nights. I actually put the comforter upside because I thought the darker brown looked better at the top and the lighter brown at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna M

customer_reviews.title: Rips apart fast
customer_reviews.text: I loved this comforter, knew it looked cheap but liked the colors. Within 1.5months. Only1 wash and it has ripped at the seam. And some of the stitches on the top are coming apart. Too bad. I wish it happened when i could still return it.
customer_reviews.author: Pathy Kay

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to purchase after reading some of the lower reviews, but he quality seems good and it looks very nice. There are a couple of loose threads but I think they can just be clipped. My only real complaint is that it is more purple than I thought, in the photo the top is folded down so I didn't realize that he whole upper half is purple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cuddly soft - great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our camper and the softness of the comforter is amazing - will be buying a set for our home. It is light weight but warm enough on the cool nights.
customer_reviews.author: Peehen

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice comforter set. It's a little on the pricey side, but you get what you pay for. The main reason we bought this set is because another reviewer stated it doesn't hang onto pet hair (we have a dog) and I must agree! It looks great and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Soto

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful soft and durable. Nothing else needs to be said.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful soft and durable. Nothing else needs to be said. 2 months in. Love it. Washed a few times. No fading or tearing. Very very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price. She's satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. Fast delivery and in perfect condition. No clumps, no bumps, no tares, no discoloration. Feels soft and seems like great quality for the price. No bed sheet nor blanket. Just 2 pillow cases, skirt, comforter and 3 decor pillows. We knew this buying so we ordered a separate bed sheet (ASIN B07196BYJ8) tan in color and looks perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rigoberto Rodriguez III

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and very comfortable
